*Copy/paste the code lines in the terminal to analyze SC RNA-seq data.*

# 1-Processing

``` bash
source ./get_files.sh
source ./run_pipeline.sh
```

/!\\ All the samples must be in this form : **SAMPLE_prolif** or **SAMPLE_diff**

-   Please modify by hand the directories in cellranger : `/cellranger/count/sample-SAMPLE_(diff/prolif)`

``` bash
sbatch --output=1rmd.out --wrap=" source ./rmd_1.sh "
```

-   Modify args.txt (pc + doublet_rate)

# 2-Analysis

``` bash
sbatch --output=2rmd.out --wrap=" source ./rmd_2.sh "
```

-   Choose pc

## a) All genes

``` bash
sbatch --output=3rmd.out --wrap=" source ./rmd_3.sh "
```

-   Choose resolution

``` bash
sbatch --output=4rmd.out --wrap=" source ./rmd_4.sh "
```

``` bash
sbatch --output=objects.out --wrap=" source ./create_objects.sh "
```

## b) Metabo genes

``` bash
sbatch --output=metabo1.out --wrap=" source ./rmd_6.sh "
```
